data.actual_result: You end up not doing that and Jessica goes to the roller rink with James, leaving you on your lonesome.
data.expected_result: You can become the next DDR sensation and wow your friends with some cool new tricks you learned from your nan
data.short_description: Cannot use the DDR controls in the "CTRL + /" menu (CMD + / on Mac) while selected in a chat box. (Also breaks the hh -> nk easter egg in the same manner)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find really any server - Type a message in the chat box (not really required, but basically makes sure that you're doing the right thing - Press CTRL + / (CMD + /) - Try becoming the next DDR sensation
